title.rendered: Amazon Listing Errors with Jana Krekic from YLT Translations

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:20 — 25.9MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Jana Krekic is an E-commerce business consulting expert and founder of YLT Translations. Jana helps sellers scale their businesses internationally and help with cross border selling.

She also provides services to 7 figure sellers become 8 figure sellers through translations and keyword research inc flat-file creations

Today, she will share her thoughts about Amazon listing errors.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • Problems in using machine translations for listings
  • Google translate on Google Sheets
  • The ups and downs in using Keyword translations
  • The disadvantages of changing your listings and PPC last minute
  • Why understanding your local market is important
  • Why you should never be out of stock
  • How not to lose your ranking from the last 2 months
  • The importance of timing and waiting for results
  • Tips in making bullet points for your listings
